org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Class LazyQueryDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.LazyQueryDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, QueryDefinition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityQueryDefinition

    public class LazyQueryDefinition
extends Object
implements QueryDefinition, Serializable
    Default implementation of Query Definition. Contains the property, filtering and sorting information of query.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                   int batchSize,
                   Object idPropertyId)
        Constructor which sets the batch size.
        Parameters:
        compositeItems - True if native items should be wrapped to CompositeItems.
        batchSize - Value for batch size.
        idPropertyId - The ID of the ID property or null if item index in result set is used as ID.
